OCD.name: Apache Jackrabbit Oak Async Indexer Service
OCD.description: Configures the async indexer services which performs periodic indexing of repository content

AD.name: Async Indexer Configs
AD.description: Async indexer configs in the form of <name>:<interval in secs> e.g. "async:5"

AD.name: Lease time out
AD.description: Lease timeout in minutes. AsyncIndexer would wait for this timeout period before breaking async indexer lease

AD.name: Failing Index Timeout (s)
AD.description: Time interval in seconds after which a failing index is considered as corrupted and ignored from further indexing untill reindex. To disable this set it to 0

AD.name: Error warn interval (s)
AD.description: Time interval in seconds after which a warning log would be logged for skipped indexes. This is done to avoid flooding the log in case of corrupted index.
